title: Migraine

en: You finish your work early this evening and have the option of taking off early or spending some extra time polishing up your skills.

yes_caption: Take some medicine and push on
no_caption: Finish up what you can and go lay down

en: You take some medicine and keep working, but in no time the migraine hits. The medicine was no help. You're completely unable to keep going, and take the night off.
You crawl into bed, all lights shut off. You feel bad about the work that's not getting done, but after a while realize you probably needed a break anyways.
